channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards points to World of Hyatt
item.description: Here's a look at when and how to transfer Chase points to Hyatt. World of Hyatt offers valuable redemptions and is one of the best Chase transfer part...

item.title: 44 new Hyatt hotels where you can get 500 extra points per night
item.description: World of Hyatt offers its members 500 bonus points per night at select new hotels for a limited time after the hotel opens. Here's how to get those po...

item.title: What are points and miles worth? TPG’s February 2026 monthly valuations
item.description: Learn how points and miles from major loyalty programs stack up. Here's how TPG values each major credit card, hotel and airline rewards currency.

item.title: American Airlines adds 2 new Canadian routes from New York
item.description: American Airlines will link New York with Calgary and Quebec City this summer.

item.title: Book flights to Europe starting at 18,750 miles: Check out Flying Blue’s February Promo Rewards
item.description: With the latest Flying Blue Promo Rewards sale, you can book a one-way flight from the U.S. to Europe for only 18,750 miles. Here's what you should kn...
